content.rendered:
[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

  • Idara Ma'arif ul Quran
    A Reputed Institute Providing Islamic & Modern Education Country-wide
  • Idara Ma'arif ul Quran
    A Reputed Institute Providing Islamic & Modern Education Country-wide
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” equal_height=”yes” rtl_reverse=”yes” content_placement=”middle” bg_type=”bg_color” bg_color_value=”#ededed”][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″]
Who We re

Idara Ma'arif ul Quran

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” rtl_reverse=”yes” content_placement=”middle”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text css_animation=”slideInLeft”]

Maarif-ul-Quran is a peerless religious institute that offers exceptional teachings of the Qur’an. We offer Nazra, Hifz-e-Qur’an, along with modern sciences education. This helps students to be more productive in the field they choose for higher studies while nourishing them with the knowledge of Qur’an. Maarif ul Qur’an is keen to take every step to make the curriculum beneficial for its students each day to brighten the minds of the students in our institute.

Watch our Documentary video to understand our Aims & Objectives

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space]

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_video link=”https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kOXQEdefsts” align=”right” css_animation=”slideInRight”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” equal_height=”yes” rtl_reverse=”yes” content_placement=”middle” bg_type=”image” parallax_style=”vcpb-default” bg_image_new=”id^15189|url^https://besttechglobal.com/projects/marif/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/81805-copy-2.jpg|caption^Golden mandala on white background vector|alt^null|title^Print|description^null”][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” rtl_reverse=”yes” content_placement=”middle”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”12892″ img_size=”full” style=”vc_box_rounded” css_animation=”slideInLeft” css=”.vc_custom_1611435942601{border-top-width: 3px !important;border-right-width: 3px !important;border-bottom-width: 3px !important;border-left-width: 3px !important;border-left-color: #009548 !important;border-left-style: double !important;border-right-color: #009548 !important;border-right-style: double !important;border-top-color: #009548 !important;border-top-style: double !important;border-bottom-color: #009548 !important;border-bottom-style: double !important;border-radius: 5px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]
Under the Supervision of Founder & Rais

Hazrat Moulana Abdul Waheed

[vc_column_text css_animation=”slideInLeft”]

It has always been my desire to work on the common citizens to attract them towards Islamic education -and I made every possible effort to do so). Generally, the number of students studying in seminaries who come from remote areas of the country the number of local urban students due to environmental differences and negative propaganda about seminaries, most of the people are reluctant to send their children to seminaries.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space]

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” full_height=”yes” equal_height=”yes” rtl_reverse=”yes” bg_type=”image” parallax_style=”vcpb-default” bg_image_new=”id^15320|url^https://besttechglobal.com/projects/marif/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/page-header-ex.jpg|caption^null|alt^null|title^page header ex|description^null” bg_image_repeat=”no-repeat” bg_img_attach=”fixed” enable_overlay=”enable_overlay_value” overlay_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.65)” overlay_pattern=”01.png” css=”.vc_custom_1611854803581{background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″]
Serving the Nation

What We Do

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

Montessori

The school offers excellent education from Montessori to 10 for both Huffaz & Non-Huffaz
Students.

READ MORE
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

Hifzul Qur'an

Maarif-ul-Quran provides a splendid system for Hifzul Quran which consists of Quaida, Nazra, Hifz & Gardan for both genders separately.

READ MORE
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

Al Maarif High School (Boys)

The school offers excellent education from class 1 to 10 for only Huffaz Boys Students.

READ MORE
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

Al Maarif High School (Girls)

The school offers excellent education from class 1 to 10 for both Huffaz & Non-Huffaz Girls Students.

READ MORE
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

Dars-e-Nizami (Boys & Girls)

Maarif ul Quran comes up with quality education according to the recommended syllabus of the Wifaq-ul-Madaris-Arabia Pakistan.
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

Religious Education (Women)

We provide special religious education and training courses for women and also taught Quran e Majeed with the rules of Tajweed.

READ MORE
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”64px”]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” gap=”10″ equal_height=”yes” rtl_reverse=”yes” content_placement=”middle” bg_type=”u_iframe” u_video_url=”https://youtu.be/rMzH5TNag6k” video_opts=”loop,muted” video_poster=”id^15837|url^https://besttechglobal.com/projects/marif/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/Idara-Maarif-Docu-for-Mobile-025.jpg|caption^null|alt^null|title^Idara Maarif Docu for Mobile 025|description^null” enable_overlay=”enable_overlay_value” overlay_color=”#000000″ overlay_pattern=”01.png”][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″]
(Sponsorship)

Scholarship Programs

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” rtl_reverse=”yes” content_placement=”top” gap=”10″][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1612372368447{background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.5) !important;*background-color: rgb(0,0,0) !important;border: 1px solid #ffffff !important;border-radius: 5px !important;}”]
Memorization of the Holy Quran
The teaching of the Qur’an in Ma’arif-ul-Quran is in its full swing. A large number of deserving students are studying in the Department of Hifz-e-Quran. Teaching the Quran is a great charity in which you may also co-operate with us, and draw the attention of your relatives to it.

Monthly expenses: Rs.3000 ………. Annual expenses: Rs.36,000

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1612372282396{background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.5) !important;*background-color: rgb(0,0,0) !important;border: 1px solid #ffffff !important;border-radius: 5px !important;}”]
Huffaz School Program:
A unique & successful education system consisting of 5 years under the Matriculation board, in a purely religious environment, under the supervision of experienced teachers, a Hafiz student (Girl or Boy) is provided with school education.

Monthly expenses: Rs.3500 ….. Annual expenses: Rs.42,000

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” bg_type=”image” parallax_style=”vcpb-animated” bg_image_new=”id^15830|url^https://besttechglobal.com/projects/marif/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/white-back.png|caption^null|alt^null|title^white back|description^null” css=”.vc_custom_1611527693268{background-color: #ededed !important;}”][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”64px”]
